entry.title: EO-114 (white berries stocking)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Holiday Decors
Price: 24.00

This soft yet durable stockings could be perfect for this holiday season. Feature is classic Christmas colors with a touch of modern design. Made from felt hand stitching details and have an open top so they can be filled with treats and comes with felt ribbon ready to hang.

size: 11” L x 16” Ht.
composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: EO-107 (winter snowman decor)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Holiday Decors
Price: 23.00

This adorable and whimsical felted decors could grace any home through the holiday season or any season. They are made of 100% wool by needle-felting techniques. This simple, yet creative decors adds peace, love and harmony to your holiday atmosphere and can also be special gift on any occasions.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: LCS-3 (snowflakes stocking)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Holiday Decors
Price: 24.00

Decor your home with our hand knitted woolen Christmas stockings and put gifts and small trinkets on Christmas morning. Crafted from wool, it showcases undeniably Nordic flair and will be treasured for many years.   The contrasting color is beautiful and enhances the grace of your festive decoration.
  • Handmade with 100%, wool, a renewable material
  • Great gift all year round

SIZE: 11” L x 16” Ht.
CARE: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from
their appearance on your display, as it depends on your
monitor settings.
